description: Creamy and cheesy vegan polenta and plant based meatballs in a rich tomato sauce makes for a comforting dinner.
name: Vegan Meatballs with Creamy Polenta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onion and fennel for 6-7 minutes to soften. Add the garlic and oregano and cook for 1 minute. Add the meatballs and cook for 5 minutes until browned.
Pour over the chopped tomatoes and a quarter of a tin of water, bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 10 minutes.

Meanwhile, bring 750ml of water to the boil in a pan and slowly add the polenta, whisking all the time. Reduce the heat to low and cook for 8-10 minutes, whisking all the time. Stir in the vegan butter and cheese.
Serve the meatballs on a bed of polenta with extra vegan cheese on top, if desired.
